name: Pacwyn 22 Draft & Pack Opener
description:
Pacwyn 22 is here - it's a pack opener game you must to try right now!

Open a lot of packs every day and complete collections of football players. The game offers you exclusive challenges, like drafts, squad building, objectives and achievements - there is everything for you in the game.

Pacwyn 22 is an online game, where you play with opponents from over the world or you can have a fun with your friends.

Playing Pacwyn Football Draft and Pack Opener you can:
1. Complete different collections of your favourite football players;
2. Join association/clans with your friends, participate in association tournaments and win big rewards;
3. Open regular packs, lightning rounds. We make a lot of fantastic pack opening events;
4. Build drafts to try different tactics in the matches;
5. Complete Objectives and receive unique achievements;
6. Play Weekend Tournaments to move to TOP 1 in the WorldWide Leaderboard;
7. Building squads and playing online matches against the opponents;
8. Trade with others users for more stuff or trade with your friends;
9. Play mini-games to get even more rewards.

Pacwyn 22 has a great community of users, join us right now and find new friends!

This application’s sole purpose is to help its users learn how to build the best drafts and squads, find out more about football players and updates.
